mapper.select: select d.*,h.HouseName houseName from HouseData_GH d inner join House_GH h on d.HouseId = h.Id and d.ZoneCode = h.ZoneCode inner join (select HouseId,max(TimeSpan) TimeSpan from HouseData_GH where ZoneCode = #{_parameter} group by HouseId) b on d.TimeSpan = b.TimeSpan order by HouseId
